nodes.text: Pavo Prime was a warm gambling planet in the Inner Rim.
Pavo Prime joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY.
It was also the home of several species of fish, some of which were displayed in an aquarium in the lobby of a Galactic Alliance Security blockhouse on Coruscant in 43 ABY.
